title: Is it possible to still make it big on YouTube or social media, or has the industry become too saturated? - Quora

response.answer_text: The simple answer is Yes. Although the no. Of YouTubers / content creators is increasing rapidly we should also consider the amount of viewers who are consuming this content. An audience wants something new and refreshing . Obviously the good old creators are still there and have audiences attention but if you are creative enough, if you are willing enough , if you bring something fresh in the game then definitely people will watch it and appreciate it. ( I am a new youtuber as well and honestly being successful on YouTube is easy than it will be tomorrow and so on)

According to Tech Crunch, there are 1.5 billion logged in users visiting YouTube every month. 1.5 billion! YouTube has 1.5 billion logged-in monthly users watching a ton of mobile video I couldn’t find out how many YouTube marketers there are, but I am willing to bet that it is not even close to being enough to saturate a market of that size. So, yes, it is still very possible. Cheers!
